attributes.action: award Martyn Booty an MBE for his services to football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Martyn Booty is a legend in my eyes after his sterling work in defence for the Southend United team of the late 90s. In a lacklustre period for the club, Booty was a mainstay in a poor team which excelled in mediocrity.
He also spells his name with a 'y' which is clearly totally unnecessary.
All hail Martyn Booty!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
